tidbits.title: French Overseas Territory
tidbits.description: Wallis and Futuna is a French overseas collectivity consisting of two groups of islands, known for their French Polynesian and Melanesian cultural influences.

tidbits.title: Traditional Culture
tidbits.description: The islands have a rich traditional culture, including dance, music, and crafts, with customary chiefs maintaining authority and customary traditions.

tidbits.title: Remote Pacific Islands
tidbits.description: Located in the Pacific Ocean, these islands are relatively remote, with a small population, stunning landscapes, and a slower-paced lifestyle.
